topic.title: FR 25.4: Provide Support to Include hand written XSP

section.title: Description
section.p: The new widget "IncludeXSP" allows the user to include into an existing page a hand written XSP.

ol.li:
Technical considerations
The new "IncludeXSP" widgets and its properties are added to the file xgui-widget-library.metamodel that contains all the definition of widget.
The figure IncludeXSPFigure implements the specific processing to draw this new figure. The definition of the model for rendering the figure is defined in the file page-designer.uimodel.
A specific transformer for XGUI is realized by the java class IncludeXSPWidgetTransformer and it is bind to the IncludeXSP Widget Type in the definition file page-designer.transformmodel.
